name: NekAI
description:
NekAI

NekAI is a mini metroidvania, in which we will control an astronaut who must repair his spaceship with the help of NekAI an IA that is a cat.

In the game we will find platforms, action and collection of objects that will help you in your adventure

Download instructions:

Extract the file, open the folder and click on NekAI.exe
